text:
Error messages printed by org.apache.catalina.servlets.ManagerServlet ( 
including HTMLManagerServlet ) are based on LocalString.properties.
So, the output character encoding of servlet response should be specified in 
accordance with the default locale of the server.
creator: super-creek@jcom.home.ne.jp

text:
Created attachment 2385
The additional setting of the output encoding depending on the default locale is included in this patch.
creator: super-creek@jcom.home.ne.jp
